abstract: The company said a programming error resulted in the collecting of snippets of data that happened to be transmitted over nonpassword protected Wi-Fi networks that the Google camera cars were passing.
snippet: The company said a programming error resulted in the collecting of snippets of data that happened to be transmitted over nonpassword protected Wi-Fi networks that the Google camera cars were passing.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Google said on Friday that for more than three years it had inadvertently collected snippets of private information that people send over unencrypted wireless networks.

headline.main: Google Says It Collected Private Data by Mistake
headline.print_headline: Google Says It Collected Private Data By Mistake

abstract: European regulators and privacy advocates reacted angrily to the disclosure by Google that it had systematically collected private data on individuals since 2006 while compiling its StreetView photo archive.
snippet: European regulators and privacy advocates reacted angrily to the disclosure by Google that it had systematically collected private data on individuals since 2006 while compiling its StreetView photo archive.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — European privacy regulators and advocates reacted angrily Saturday to the disclosure by Google, the world’s largest search engine, that it had systematically collected private data since 2006 while compiling its Street View photo archive.

headline.main: Google Data Admission Angers European Officials
headline.print_headline: Anger in Europe Over Google and Privacy

abstract: The Onion’s C.E.O. says a retired general taught him a vital lesson: that there’s always one more way to solve a tough problem.
snippet: The Onion’s C.E.O. says a retired general taught him a vital lesson: that there’s always one more way to solve a tough problem.
lead_paragraph: This interview with Steve Hannah, chief executive of The Onion,  was conducted and condensed by Adam Bryant.

headline.main: If Plan B Fails, Go Through the Alphabet
headline.print_headline: If Plan B Fails, Go Through the Alphabet
